author: A.D. RangarajanTIRUPATI
title: British national leaves quarantine centre, thanks caregivers
description: He was lodged in Padmavathi Nilayam since March 24
content:
Amid cheers, Clive Bryant Culley profusely thanked his caregivers and caretakers, as he left the COVID-19 quarantine centre at Padmavathi Nilayam here on Thursday, completing his mandatory quarantine period.
A Wales-based geography professor, Culley came to … [+1171 chars]
